name: Datto
tag_list: backup, disaster-recovery, storage, virtualization, business-continuity, nas, bdr
overview:
Datto Inc. is the leading provider of hardware based on- and off-site backup and disaster recovery solutions. Founded in 2007 and channel-only since 2009, Datto is changing how the channel delivers complete business continuity.

Datto’s solutions are offered exclusively through our Resale Partners; our extensive network includes over 1,800 IT service providers throughout North America and Europe. End companies using Datto for their data security and business continuity needs include: hospitals, banks, municipalities, law firms, small home offices, financial broker-dealers, manufacturers, investment banks, insurance agencies, casinos, credit unions, universities, and more.

We’ve created the company we’d want to partner with. Our flexible solutions can be customized to work in any environment and across all platforms. Datto believes in providing the best products at affordable and honest prices; just one of the many reasons why our pricing is straightforward with no complicated fee structures.

Datto’s award-winning technology, innovative business practices and desire to work with our resale partners is changing the way the channel does backup and business continuity.

Datto offers the largest spectrum of BDR solutions: The Datto SIRIS is a true business continuity solution that is rapidly gaining momentum in the channel and is also Dattoâ€™s flagship product. SIRIS dramatically simplifies and streamlines the BDR process by eliminating the traditional backup chain and converts data straight to .vmdk files. SIRIS is the only BDR solution that offers instant on- and off-site virtualization and screenshot backup verification.

The Datto Viridian offers on- and off-site backup with virtualization technology using StorageCraftâ€™s ShadowProtect software. Viridian offers comprehensive data backup and can also be used as a powerful file server, allowing multiple users to store and share files.

The Datto G Series is the perfect automated on- and off-site backup solution for small businesses. The mantra for the G Series is â€œsimple, flexible and affordableâ€. Dattoâ€™s G Series has been reinvented and now offers an upgraded feature set and flexible licensing and software options.

For more information on Datto Solutions, please visit www.dattobackup.com or call our sales department at 203.665.6423.
